name: Onslaught (itch) (Shadow Interactive)
description:
In Onslaught, you and a friend will work together to survive waves of enemies to become the champions of the Onslaught Arena. This game was built in C++ using OpenGL 4.2 for rendering. This game requires 2 XInput controllers to be fully played.

This game is a product of Shadow Interactive, 2018.

Credits:
Atiya Nova
Chris Bull
Shane Scott
Matthew Holt (dovahcooper.itch.io)
